title.narrative: Responsible and Accountable Garment Sector Programme - Fund Management Costs

description.narrative: This activity (Responsible and Accountable Garment Sector Programme - Fund Management Costs) is a component of Responsible and Accountable Garments Sector (Rags) to Improve Working Conditions in Garment Sector in Poor Countries reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £3,059,300. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Business Policy and Administration, Trade policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Maxwell Stamp PLC. The start date is 03-08-2009 and the end date is 31-12-2013.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
